title: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN Ultimate Ninja STORM 2
description: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 2 is a tour de force of Naruto thrills and spills. Impressively faithful to the universe of the anime , the game takes players through the Naruto Shippuden story arc with new battle systems enhancing the gameplay. Players must choose the right companions to fight alongside and together unleash explosive Team Special Techniques to lay waste to opponents. Ultimate Ninja STORM 2 has been remastered in HD. NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM

system_requirements.OS: Windows (64bit) 7 or higher up to date
